gw.api.web.delinquency

Class DelinquencyUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.web.delinquency.DelinquencyUtil

  • public class DelinquencyUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This class has methods which can be used for DelinquencyProcesses, primarily startDelinquencies(DelinquencyTarget[], DelinquencyReason)

    • Method Detail

      • startDelinquencies

        public static java.util.List<DelinquencyProcess> startDelinquencies(DelinquencyTarget[] targets,
                                                    DelinquencyReason reason)
        Starts delinquency on the each of the specified policy periods with the given reason. In 2.0, policy periods can have multiple delinquencies, If any of the policy periods already have an active delinquency process, no delinquency will start for any of the policy periods and a UserDisplayableException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        targets - the list of Delinquency Targets (accounts, policy periods, etc) to start delinquency
        reason - the reason why delinquency is started
        Returns:
        a list of delinquencies that were started
        Throws:
        com.guidewire.pl.web.controller.UserDisplayableException - if any of the policy periods have an active delinquency process

      • invokeTrigger

        public static boolean invokeTrigger(com.guidewire.pl.web.navigation.Location location,
                    DelinquencyProcess delinquencyProcess,
                    WorkflowTriggerKey trigger)
        Parameters:
        location - a UI Location
        delinquencyProcess - the DelinquencyProcess on which to invoke the trigger
        trigger - the WorkflowTriggerKey to invoke on the DelinquencyProcess
        Returns:
        true if the trigger was available, and thus was invoked; returns false otherwise
